title: paripUrNa sutantara
sahitya:
paripUrNa sutantira varam vENDum annaiyE


anupallavi

  virivAna viNNilE viLangum AhAyam pOlE piriyAda svarUpattil arivAgi ninriDap-


caraNam 1    oru noDi inbamum OyAda tunbamum perugum iru vinaiyin bhEdamai illAda
kaTTaDimait-tuyarai veTTi erindu manap-paTrait-turandu sukhamuTra jnAna dhIranAm
    caraNam 2    mOhAntakArattil mUzhgi azhikkAmal EkAnta mOnattil irundapaDi irukka
shuddha cidAnanda turiya vaLa nATTil siddharuDanE jIvan muktanAi vAzhndiDum
